abstract: Merck‘s $41 billion acquisition of Schering-Plough was already generating controversy Monday morning, as analysts expressed concern that a side deal with Johnson & Johnson could bring complications.
snippet: Merck‘s $41 billion acquisition of Schering-Plough was already generating controversy Monday morning, as analysts expressed concern that a side deal with Johnson & Johnson could bring complications.

headline.main: Side Deal with J&J Clouds Schering Sale
